extension_name.description: The display name for the extension.

extension_description.message: Extension for Downie, allowing you to send links to Downie with a single click.
extension_description.description: Description of what the extension does.

open_current_link_mp4.description: Opens current link in Downie with MP4 postprocessing.

open_current_link_permute.description: Opens current link in Downie with Permute postprocessing.
